data.expected_result: The Slider stays at the end (As it does when you go too far)
data.short_description: [Overlay] Opacity Slider resets to 0% when you move your mouse a little over the end of the slider.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game with Overlay - Open Overlay - Unpin chat - Open the Opacity option in the top right corner of chat - Move the slider to far right, and move a little off the slider area. (Too far and it won't work)
